resources: TestYourselfIndia Based on best CDC guidelines, illness severity and risk factors like age and pre-existing conditions This application does not provide medical advice //MainUI //hints Full Name Phone Number Pincode //radio btn options City Town Village English Assamese Yes No Have you travelled to a high-risk country/Indian state or been in contact with someone who is ill and has travelled to a high-risk country/Indian state in the last 14 days ? Have you been in close contact with a laboratory confirmed COVID-19 patient within the past 14 days ? Do you have fever ? Do you have cough ? Do you have shortness in breath ? Do you have a Chronic Illness (Heart, Lung or Kidney Disease, Diabetes) or are immunocompromised (Cancer, HIV, Autoimmune Disease ) //Terms & conditions By clicking on Start Survey, you are agreeing our Privacy Policy Terms and conditions for Chai Sahyog Mobile application This is not an official app to trace COVID-19. This app is only for spreading awareness and this does not suggest any medical precaution. Build for educational purpose only. This is not an official app to trace COVID-19. Build for educational purpose only. \nWe will save your personal information, like Name, phone no, pincode etc which you will fill on our app, only if you allow us to do and those data wont be shared with any of private firm or organisation or personal except government ask us to do. //upload Can we save your test result at our end for analytics and educational purpose ? yes no //reports যিহেতু আপোনি যোৱা ১৪ দিনৰ ভিতৰত বহি ৰাজ্য বা দেশলৈ গৈছেলে বা বহি ৰাজ্য বা দেশলৈ যোৱা ব্যক্তিক লগ পাইছেলে আৰু এতিয়া আপোনাৰ জ্বৰ-কাহ হৈ আছে, গতিকে আপোনৰ গাত COVID-19 থাকিবও পাৰে (নাথাকিব ও পাৰে) | অনুগ্ৰহ কৰি ডক্তৰৰ পৰামৰ্শ লওক আপোনাৰ গাত COVID-19 লক্ষণ পোৱা নাই | ভয় নাখাব, চাফ-চিকুনকৈ থাকক In-case your symptoms change please take self assessment again or contact healthcare facility near you If you suspect a positive case, please inform nearest police station or heathase facility BE A HERO, STAY AT HOME
